item.title: [FLINK-27944] IO metrics collision happens if a task has union inputs
item.description:
When a task has union inputs, some IO metrics(numBytesIn* and numBuffersIn*) of the different inputs may collide and failed to be registered.

 

The problem can be reproduced with a simple job like:

DataStream<String> source1 = env.fromElements("abc");
DataStream<String> source2 = env.fromElements("123");
source1.union(source2).print();
